pr_title: tests: add nosem tests for every supported language

timeline.message: Fix #1045, add 'nosem' tests for every supported language

timeline.bodyText: This Java rule is currently split out because of #1051
timeline.author: mschwager
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2,5 +2,10 @@ rules:
 - id: test-nosem
   message: test-nosem-message
   severity: WARNING
-  languages: [javascript]
-  pattern: nosem_func(...)
+  languages: [c, go, javascript, python]
+  pattern: test_nosem_func(...)
+- id: test-nosem-java
